name: Custom Automatized Service
description:
CAS is the new custom automatized service in the market, but its not yet ready to be sold. First it has to pass some quality tests to verify its not dangerous.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

SPACE - Launch habilities

Q/E - swap habilities

ESC - Exit
